title: Manual Fees/Fines Table Settings schema
description: Fees/fines that are used by the entire library system. They can be a set of fees / fines shared throughout the library or fees / fines that are unique to a specific customer service

automatic.description: A flag to indicate that fee/fine was created automatically.

feeFineType.description: Description of fee/fine that is up to the discretion of the user

defaultAmount.description: Amount of fee or fine, which may be overridden.

chargeNoticeId.description: ID of the charge notice template

actionNoticeId.description: ID of the action notice template

metadata.description: Metadata about creation to fee/fine, provided by the server
